skills.Name: Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 and M. Atk. by 1.9.

skills.Name: Robe Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 1.7 when equipped with a robe.

skills.Name: Anti Magic
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 20 and Magic Damage Resistance by 5%.

skills.Name: Higher Mana Gain
skills.Description: Increases the recovery rate when MP is being recovered by recharge.

skills.Name: Boost Mana
skills.Description: Increases Max MP by 30.

skills.Name: Fast Spell Casting
skills.Description: Increases Casting Spd. by 5%.

skills.Name: Clear Mind
skills.Description: Increases MP Recovery Bonus by 2.6 while standing and by 3.2 when walking.

skills.Name: Hurricane
skills.Description: Creates a whirlwind that uses 46 Power to inflict Wind damage to the enemy.

skills.Name: Wind Stance
skills.Description: Increases M. Critical Damage by 10% and Wind defense by 10, and applies Wind to attribute magic.

skills.Name: Dark Stance
skills.Description: Increases Magical Skill Power by 5% and Dark defense by 10, and applies Dark to attribute magic.

skills.Name: Elemental Spike
skills.Description: Inflicts attribute damage with 22 power added to M. Atk. on the target and decreases the corresponding attribute defense. Over-hit.

skills.Name: Elemental Crash
skills.Description: Deals attribute damage to the target with ul power. Over-hit

skills.Name: Greater Blink
skills.Description: Teleports you 600 meters back, canceling the targets.

skills.Name: Magical Bind
skills.Description: Blast the surrounding area with magic causing 32 Magical Damage and binding the target for 5 seconds.

skills.Description: Unleash powerful wind torrents from the ground at and around your target hitting all for 20 Wind magical damage, 8 damage every 3 seconds and reducing M. Defense by 10%% over 15 seconds.
